title: The Boy Who Broke The World
description: My name is Maximillian Murphy and like my surname suggests, what can go wrong will go wrong. I just broke the world and here's how it happened:When Max Murphy is mistaken for a wizard, a wild series of flukes is set into motion, resulting in a seven-day timer ticking off to the end of the world. He and two others must embark on a cross-country road trip, braving twisty tornadoes and twisted foes to find a long-lost relic and save the world before it's beyond repair.A fast-paced, contemporary fantasy featuring an apprentice locksmith, a quick-witted girl, and a former rally car driver. With plenty of bluffs, epic car chases, and a bit of magic. All told by the POVs of 16-year-olds Max Murphy and Ashley Marie.
author: Brian Goss
